articles.title: Eradicating Anti-Christian Bias - The White House
articles.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered:     Section 1.  Purpose
articles.content:
By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered:
